entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Please state the reason for your call.
I need to **cancel order** immediately! This is ridiculous. I placed it two days ago and it hasn't even shipped. I **changed my mind** and I want it gone.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. I understand you'd like to **cancel order**. Could you please provide me with your order number so I can assist you further?
Ugh, fine. It's VF789234. And I also want to **refund my card**. Don't even think about sending me that bike!
Thank you. Let me pull up order VF789234. Okay, I see it here. To confirm, you'd like to **cancel order** and receive a full refund.
Yes! Cancel it! And how long is it going to take to **refund my card**? I need that money back now.

I understand your frustration. I've now cancelled your order. The refund will be processed back to your original method of payment. You should see it reflected in your account within 5-7 business days.
5 to 7 days?! Seriously? What if it ships before then? I want you to **stop delivery**!

I understand your concern. Since the order has now been cancelled and a refund processed, the shipping department will be notified to **stop delivery**. You won't be charged for anything further. You'll receive a confirmation email within the next hour regarding the cancellation and refund.
Okay, that's... acceptable. So you're absolutely sure you're going to **stop delivery** and **refund my card**?

Yes, absolutely. The order has been cancelled, the refund is being processed, and delivery will be stopped. You'll receive that confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for finally taking care of this.
You're welcome! Thank you for contacting VeloFit, and have a great day!
